name: Existing charter schools
text:
Any charter school holding a charter to operate under part IV, subpart D, of chapter 302A, as that subpart existed before July 11, 2006 shall be considered a charter school for the purposes of this chapter. [L 2006, c 298, pt of §2]
 
Revision Note
 
  "July 11, 2006" substituted for "the effective date of this Act".
